title: Virginia Roberts Giuffre sues Prince Andrew, Alleging Sexual Abuse as a Minor
itunes:title: Virginia Roberts Giuffre sues Prince Andrew, Alleging Sexual Abuse as a Minor
description:
Virginia Roberts Giuffre, an alleged victim of billionaire pedophile Jeffrey Epstein, has filed a lawsuit against Britain’s Prince Andrew for sexually abusing her when she was under the age of 18. Giuffre, now 38, has previously said that Epstein paid her to have sex with the 61-year-old Duke of York while she was 17. Andrew has denied the allegations. The lawsuit accuses Andrew of sexual assault and intentional infliction of emotional distress.

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Anne Bremner - Trial lawyer, Legal Analyst, Author: “Justice in the Age of Judgment”, www.annebremner.com, Twitter: @annembremner, Instagram: @Anne_Bremner
  • Dr. Bethany Marshall - Psychoanalyst, www.drbethanymarshall.com, New Netflix show: 'Bling Empire' (Beverly Hills)
  • Joe Scott Morgan - Professor of Forensics Jacksonville State University, Author, "Blood Beneath My Feet", Featured on "The Piketon Massacre: Return to Pike County" on iHeartRadio
  • Charlie Lankston - Charlie Lankston, FeMail Editor, DailyMail.com, Twitter/Instagram:@charlielanks


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
